title: [Large-Scale] Workshop for Improving Practitioner-Based Instructional Systems Design (ISD) Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design concepts and understanding of educational processes
context.additional_context: Customized instructional design competency enhancement program for science professionals. Collaboration tools in BYOD environments and case-based learning implementation

learning_goals: Participants derive core requirements for in-company science education programs with 80% accuracy using instructional design models.
Participants apply a practitioner-based system design process to collaboratively present one or more improvement proposals for existing educational systems with a team.
Participants analyze formative assessment data to specify instructional design improvements and achieve an effectiveness score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) during peer evaluations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
